title: Trying to find this Chamfered font
content:
Trying to find this font or a close relative. I am aware that this might have been altered or created completely from scratch, but I would love to find the “standard” Chamfered (Angled instead of Rounded) font that I have seen quite a bit lately.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Chamfered.1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230359/http:/typophile.com/files/Chamfered.1.jpg) | 108.7 KB |
| [Chamfered.2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230359/http:/typophile.com/files/Chamfered.2.jpg) | 33.59 KB |
author: CGA1979

comments.content:
This looks like House Industries United Sans Bold Condensed

http://www.houseind.com/fonts/unitedcollection/viewfonts

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230359im_/http:/typophile.com/files/UnitedSansBoldCondensed_6648.png)
